column5: w'egya yar: na ɔfaa ne mbabanyin beenu no
column6: Manaasɛ nye Efraim kaa no ho."

column4: wo ba Josef reba wo nkyɛn: na Israel miaa n'enyi

column3: Otumfo Nyankopɔn yii noho kyerɛɛ me wɔ Luz wɔ Keenan asaase do

column6: na mebɛyɛ wo aman asafo; na medze asaase yi ama w'asefo a wobedzi w'ekyir ma wɔdze ayɛ daa egyapadze."

column2: "Na afei wo mba beenu a ewoo hɔn wɔ Egypt asaase do ansaana mereba wo nkyɛn wɔ Egypt no
column5: dɛ Reuben nye Simeon ara so."

column2: "Na wo mba a hɔn ekyir ebɔwo hɔn no
column3: na wɔbɛyɛ wodze; wɔdze hɔn nuanom dzin bɛfrɛ hɔn wɔ hɔn egyapadze mu."

column4: Rahel wuu m'enyim wɔ kwan mu wɔ Keenan asaase do
column5: aber a aka ɔkwan kakraabi ma edu Efrat no: na misiee no Efrat kwan mu hɔ (ɔnoara nye Bɛtlɛhɛm)."

column2: "Na Israel hun Josef ne mba no

column3: me mba a Nyankopɔn dze hɔn ama me wɔ ha a. Na ɔsee dɛ

column2: "Nna onyin dodow ntsi Israel n'enyiwa do ayɛ no nkusunkusu
column3: ma onntum nnhu adze. Na Josef dze hɔn piin ne nkyɛn; na Israel feew hɔn ano
Manndwen dɛ nkyɛ mubohu w'enyim: na hwɛ
column4: Nyankopɔn ama mehu wo mba so."

column2: "Na Josef yii hɔn wɔ n'anan ntamu bae; na ɔbɔɔ no mu adze dze n'enyim boom famu."

column3: ne nsa enyimfa dze Efraim mu wɔ Israel n'abankum
column4: na ne nsa abankum dze Manaasɛ mu wɔ Israel n'enyimfa
column5: na ɔdze hɔn piin ne nkyɛn."

column3: na ɔdze too Efraim a ɔyɛ kakraba no n'etsifi
column4: na ɔdze ne nsa abankum too Manaasɛ n'etsifi
column5: ɔboapa ara yɛɛ ne nsa dɛm; osiandɛ Manaasɛ nye abakan."

column4: Nyankopɔn no a m'egyanom Abraham nye Isaak wɔnantseew n'enyim no
column5: Nyankopɔn no a ɔahwɛ me mo nkwaber nyinara mu ma ɔdze abɛpem ndɛ no
column7: "sor abɔfo no a oeyi me efi mbusu nyinara mu no
column8: onhyira mbofra yi: na wɔmma wɔmfa me dzin nye m'egyanom Abraham nye Isaak hɔn dzin mfrɛ hɔn; na wɔmma wonnyin wɔnyɛ ɔdodow wɔ asaase do."

column2: "Na aber a Josef hun dɛ n'egya dze ne nsa enyimfa ato Efraim n'etsifi no
column3: ɔannyɛ no abodwe: na osuoo n'egya ne nsa mu dɛ oriyi wɔ Efraim n'etsifi ato Manaasɛ n'etsifi."

column4: m'egya: na abakan no nye yi; fa wo nsa enyimfa to n'etsifi."

column7: na ɔno so bɛyɛ kɛse: naaso no nua kuma bɛyɛ kɛse asen no

column2: "Na ohyiraa hɔn da no see dɛ
column3: ɔwo na Israel dze wo behyira dɛ
column4: Nyankopɔn mma yɛ dɛ Efraim nye dɛ Manaasɛ: na ɔdze Efraim dzii Manaasɛ ne kan."
muruwu: na Nyankopɔn bedzi hom ekyir
column5: na ɔdze hom akɔ hom egyanom hɔn asaase do bio."

column2: "Nkyii so medze kyɛpɛn kor a ɔbor wo nuanom do a medze m'afona nye m'egyen megyee no wɔ Amorifo nsamu no ama wo."
